name: Math Fast Plus and Minus
description: Math plus and minus training, Suitable for all ages, Play anywhere and any time.  Features  Covering elementary level lessons  Can play plus, minus, And can play plus and minus at the same time  You can choose difficulty levels  Easy: has 3 choices to choose for the answer  Normal: the player needs to type their own answers  You can customize game rule  You can select the minimum and maximum numbers  Choose to finish the game immediately when the player answers incorrectly  You can choose the total question to played  You can set the game time in each round  You can play an endless game  You can check the answer after the game end, To check how you make mistakes  There are various statistics collected. Can view and check your stats at any time
